TranscendenceExtension.name: Weapons Extended 4
TranscendenceExtension.credits: Aeonic; alterecco; Atarlost; digdug; Periculi; Prophet; Star Weaver; Taben; TheLastBrunnenG; Wolfy

ItemType.name: DM400 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM400 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with sixteen KM60 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: DM500 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM500 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with sixteen KM80 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: DM600 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM600 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with sixteen KM100 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: DM700 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM700 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with sixteen KM120 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: DM800 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM800 missile rack is a disposable weapon system pre-loaded with sixteen KM140 missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: NM900 external missile pod
ItemType.description: This external pod is loaded with twelve XM900 nuclear missiles and can be installed without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: alternating laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: Bolide capacitor laser blaster
ItemType.description: Soon after release, the Bolide was rendered obsolete by EI's turbolaser cannon, though some insist the Bolide is a more economical weapon. This version uses a capacitor to reduce the power requirements.

ItemType.name: purple laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is a custom illegal version.

ItemType.name: OC-laser cannon
ItemType.description: An uncommon overcharged laser cannon: more powerful at the expenses of misfiring, shorter range and high power use.

ItemType.name: recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: depleted uranium recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: high momentum recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: boride recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Nearly as hard as diamond, boride projectiles launched by this recoilless cannon deliver a greater damage.

ItemType.name: carbide recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Nearly as hard as diamond, carbide projectiles launched by this recoilless cannon deliver a greater damage.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a much higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon v2
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a much higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: super light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a much higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: ultra light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a much higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Laser; NotForSale; EI
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: Long range Bolide laser
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Laser; NotForSale; EI
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: Comet laser blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Laser; NotForSale; EI
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: Meteor laser blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Laser; NotForSale; EI
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was obsoleted by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a better and cheaper weapon.

ItemType.name: DM1500 missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM1500 is loaded with sixteen KM500 tracking missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: purple dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons with linked fire controls. This an overpowered illegal version.

ItemType.name: pulse laser cannon
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The pulse laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors to fire extremely rapid bursts.

ItemType.name: capacitor dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons with linked fire controls and a capacitor for extra punch

ItemType.name: alternating dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; EI; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: capacitor turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon. This version uses a capacitor to reduce the power requirements.

ItemType.name: blue fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; EI; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: purple fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; EI; lightWeapon; Illegal; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This is an illegal version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: ultra fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; EI; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can nearly reach a fire rate quadruple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: enhanced heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: medium recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: high momentum heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: NAMI TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: NAMI high momentum TK10 Trident
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: NAMI enhanced TK10 Trident
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: NAMI TK08 Double cannon
ItemType.description: The TK08 is an old weapon in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK08 fires two small high-velocity projectiles. Superseded by the TK10.

ItemType.name: NAMI Close spread TK11 Trident
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: NAMI TK20 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK20 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK20 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: NAMI TK30 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK30 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK30 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: mining laser
ItemType.description: This powerful laser is generally used for asteroid mining.

ItemType.name: blinder cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Ion; Heliotropes; NotForSale
ItemType.description: A blinder cannon shoots out a thin stream of ionized particles that disrupts a ship's sensors.

ItemType.name: purple blinder cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Ion; Heliotropes; NotForSale
ItemType.description: A blinder cannon shoots out a thin stream of ionized particles that disrupts a ship's sensors.

ItemType.name: orange blinder cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Ion; Heliotropes; NotForSale
ItemType.description: A blinder cannon shoots out a thin stream of ionized particles that disrupts a ship's sensors.

ItemType.name: DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of three shells.

ItemType.name: Fast fire DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of three shells.

ItemType.name: DK30 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The DK30 Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires burst of shells. This version is improved to burst of five.

ItemType.name: DK10-KE penetrators Arbalest
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of three shells. This version has low interacting, high momentum penetrators shells.

ItemType.name: DK08 Light Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Light Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of five shells.

ItemType.name: laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: quad laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of many laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: penta laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of many laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: orange laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: blue laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: purple laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern. This is an illegal version.

ItemType.name: close spread laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons with linked fire controls arranged in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: OC-laser cannon array
ItemType.description: This laser cannon array trades high damage for shorter range, misfiring problems and high power consumption.

ItemType.name: Moskva 11 light turret
ItemType.description: This omnidirectional turret fires powerful high-explosive shells, but its range is very limited.

ItemType.name: Moskva 12 light turret
ItemType.description: This omnidirectional turret fires powerful high-explosive shells, but its range is very limited. This version has faster shells.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser omni laser cannon
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: dual fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.description: This is an enhanced version of the ubiquitous laser cannon. The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and can reach a fire rate triple that of the standard laser.

ItemType.name: dual Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Laser; NotForSale; EI
ItemType.description: Soon after its release, the Bolide laser blaster was rendered obsolete by Earth Industries' turbolaser cannon. Many, however, still insist that the Bolide is a more economical weapon.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser purple omni laser
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Rasiermesser; Laser; OmniWeapon; Illegal
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system. This version is illegal.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser OC-omni laser
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system. This version trades high damage for high power consumption, misfiring problems and shorter range.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser fastfire omni laser
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Rasiermesser; Laser; OmniWeapon; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system. Smaller Pockels-cells allow a faster firing rate at expenses of damage.

ItemType.name: NAMI missile launcher
ItemType.description: This launcher is compatible with a full range of popular missiles including the KM100 Longbows and the XM900 Lucifers.

ItemType.name: NAMI AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: NAMI high momentum AK15 Partisan
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: NAMI AK35 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: NAMI AK95 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser SmartCannon
ItemType.description: The Rasiermesser corporation introduced the SmartCannon into the low-end weapons market despite the opposition of the Commonwealth. This weapon requires SmartCannon rounds.

ItemType.name: SmartCannon Launcher
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Specialty; Rasiermesser; Cannon; Ammo; Launcher
ItemType.description: The Rasiermesser corporation introduced the SmartCannon into the low-end weapons market despite the opposition of the Commonwealth. This version is mounted as a launcher and can load multiple types of ammo.

ItemType.name: dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: boride dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: alternadual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: carbide dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: KE-penetrators dual recoilless
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons with linked fire controls. This version has higher momentum and higher penetrating power.

ItemType.name: turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: alternating turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: orange turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: blue turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: purple turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon. This version is illegal.

ItemType.name: OC-turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: fast fire turbolaser cannon
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Laser; EI; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: This modified turbolaser has smaller Pockels-cells, allowing it to have faster fire rate at expenses of the damage power.

ItemType.name: Mankiri laser blaster
ItemType.description: The Mankiri is a Bushido competitor to the EI laser array.

ItemType.name: Tanto heavy laser
ItemType.description: Bushido's competitor to the EI turbolaser.

ItemType.name: Tessen fan-beam laser
ItemType.description: The Tessen is a Bushido competitor to the EI laser array.

ItemType.name: Kusarigama laser turret
ItemType.description: Bushido's competitor to the EI omni laser.

ItemType.name: dual Tanto heavy laser
ItemType.description: Twin turbolaser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: actinide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The actinide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: high rad actinide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The actinide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: lantanide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The lantanide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: AK505 Ballista cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Ballista cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: AK506 Scorpio cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Scorpio cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: AK507 Ampurias cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Ampurias cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: AK508 Gastraphetes cannon
ItemType.description: This modifier version of the NAMI Ballista cannon fires smaller projectiles in short burst.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser Flenser cannon
ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser Fast Fire Flenser
ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon is a much improved version of the recoilless cannon. Its greater power is able to fire small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser MAG launcher
ItemType.description: The MAG launcher is a flexible and sophisticated grenade launcher that is compatible with a large range of MAG munitions.

ItemType.name: particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: blue particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: OC-particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target. This overcharged version tends to misfire sometimes.

ItemType.description: NAMI's Morning Star cannon shoots a high-velocity cloud of dense particles that can severely damage light to medium armor.

ItemType.name: Bushido Shuriken neutron blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Bushido; Particle; sungSlavers
ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, the neutron blaster uses a double chamber design to shoot high-energy blasts of neutrons. The Shuriken is manufactured by the Bushido corporation.

ItemType.name: Bushido Kurmaken neutron blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Specialty; Bushido; Particle; sungSlavers
ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, the neutron blaster uses a double chamber design to shoot high-energy blasts of neutrons. The Kurmaken is manufactured by the Bushido corporation.

ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, the neutron blaster uses a double chamber design to shoot high-energy blasts of neutrons. The kozuka is manufactured by the Bushido corporation.

ItemType.name: Moskva 33 repeater
ItemType.description: One of the most successful Makayev designs, the Shtorm repeater fires a cluster of high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser Akan 600 turret
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Specialty; Rasiermesser; OmniWeapon; BlastCannon; Ranx; Ammo
ItemType.description: This weapons places an Akan 30 cannon on a computer-controlled, omnidirectional turret. This weapon requires solely the Akan 30 cannon shells.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser Akan 600 launcher
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Specialty; Rasiermesser; OmniWeapon; BlastCannon; Ranx; Ammo
ItemType.description: This weapons places an Akan 30 cannon on a computer-controlled, omnidirectional turret. This version is mounted as a launcher and uses a variety of ammos.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile system
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Specialty; BlastCannon; Ammo; EI
ItemType.description: The Dragonfly missile system is a cheap cartridge missile launcher that fires three micro-missiles at a ten-degree spread. The Dragonfly system accepts only Dragonfly missile cartridges.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile launcher
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Specialty; BlastCannon; Ammo; EI; Launcher
ItemType.description: The Dragonfly missile system is a cheap cartridge missile launcher that fires three micro-missiles at a ten-degree spread. This version is mounted as a launcher and uses a variety of ammos.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser dual Flenser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin Flenser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser dual Flenser X2
ItemType.description: Twin Flenser cannons with linked fire controls. Slower than the normal version, it loads much stronger projectiles.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser alternadual Flenser
ItemType.description: Twin Flenser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser triple Flenser
ItemType.description: Triple nozzle Flenser cannon with linked fire controls.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser quad Flenser
ItemType.description: Quad barreled Flenser cannons with linked fire controls.

ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the mark I howitzer.

ItemType.name: Makayev mark III-o howitzer
ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the mark I howitzer.

ItemType.name: Makayev mark III-T howitzer

ItemType.name: Makayev Kashtan m-III howitzer

ItemType.description: The Nandao bolt cannon fires a sublight pulse of heavy ions, causing damage similar to that of particle beam weapons, with much greater energy density. This weapon requires and uses only Nandao bolt cartridges.

ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Specialty; Bushido; Particle; sungSlavers; Ammo; NotForSale; Launcher
ItemType.description: The Nandao bolt cannon fires a sublight pulse of heavy ions, causing damage similar to that of particle beam weapons, with much greater energy density. This version is mounted as a launcher and uses multiple types of ammo.

ItemType.name: Ferian plasma torch(es)

ItemType.name: Makayev V-h howitzer

ItemType.name: Makayev mark 5.1 howitzer
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Makayev; Military; ThermoCannon; Xenophobe; Howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark V howitzer fires a light thermonuclear shell. This version has been highly improved with a less recoil and a higher nuclear charge.

ItemType.name: NAMI mine launcher
ItemType.description: The NAMI mine launcher is used by the Commonwealth Fleet to defend colonies in Ares space.

ItemType.name: Bushido thermo cannon
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Bushido; Specialty; ThermoCannon; Ammo
ItemType.description: Produced in great numbers during the Syrtis War, this cannon is now common throughout the wartorn regions bordering the Ares Orthodoxy. The cannon fires standard thermo cannon shells only.

ItemType.name: Bushido thermo launcher
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; Bushido; Specialty; ThermoCannon; Ammo; Launcher
ItemType.description: Produced in great numbers during the Syrtis War, this cannon is now common throughout the wartorn regions bordering the Ares Orthodoxy. This version is mounted as a launcher and fires multiple types of ammo.

ItemType.name: tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: tritium-3He cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium - Helium 3 shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion, larger than pure tritium fusion devices.

ItemType.name: tritium-deuterium cannon
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; ThermoCannon; lightWeapon; NAMI; NotForSale
ItemType.description: The tritium-deuterium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion. Even if tritium-deuterium mixtures are less effective than pure tritium fusion devices, they are lighter and faster

ItemType.name: high momentum tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: high speed tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire Keres howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire Zeus howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space. This version has a larger thermonuclear payload.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire Heracles howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space. This version has faster missiles.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire Cronus howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space. This version has slower missiles.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire Thanatos howitzer
ItemType.attributes: MajorItem; Military; ThermoCannon; lightWeapon; NAMI; NotForSale; Howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space. This version is lighter.

ItemType.description: The ion blaster is used by Luminous for its drones and hunter-killers. This version is extremely fast, but very short ranged.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser launcher

ItemType.name: Taikon TM7 multitarget cannon

ItemType.name: orange omni ion blaster

ItemType.name: Teraton Kytryn blaster
ItemType.description: Kytryn blasters were created by the Teratons based on research on Iocrym technology.

ItemType.name: advanced tritium cannon
ItemType.description: This improved version can fire at quadruple the rate of the tritium cannon. Unfortunately, the cannon overheats quickly if fired continuously.

ItemType.name: Taikon IM90 multitarget blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Military; Taikon; Ion; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: Taikon's IM90 blaster mounts three independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: Taikon IM72 multitarget blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Military; Taikon; Ion; OmniWeapon; lightWeapon; NotForSale
ItemType.description: Taikon's IM72 blaster mounts three independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: Taikon IM96 multitarget blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Military; Taikon; Ion; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: Taikon's IM96 blaster mounts four independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: Taikon IZ90 multitarget blaster
ItemType.attributes: EnergyWeapon; MajorItem; Military; Taikon; Ion; OmniWeapon
ItemType.description: Taikon's IZ90 blaster mounts the incredible number of five independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: Teraton Kytryn launcher
ItemType.attributes: Alien; MajorItem; Military; Launcher; Plasma; Ammo; Teraton
ItemType.description: This alien weapon launches a Kytryn plasma pod warhead, which blossoms into a shell of plasma energy.

ItemType.name: plasma cannon
ItemType.description: This weapon emits a powerful plasma burst that can incinerate an unprotected ship. Plasma cannons are military weapons generally unavailable to civilian ships.
